channel.title: I Gotz 2 problmes! [Pic taking+cropping]
channel.description:
Ok, so you take a Picture by holding Ctrl+Pring Screen.. Then go to pain and pull it upp how....???
Ok, I NEED TO CROP THE PICTURES HOW TO DO [B] WITHOUT PHOTOSHOP[/B]

item.title: I Gotz 2 problmes! [Pic taking+cropping]
item.dc:creator: @Maskmanator Maskmanator
item.description:
@Maskmanator wrote:

No problem man. I would recommend Gimp also, other than paint, and personally Photoshop over Gimp. But Gimp is free and hard to get used to. But again, no problem man.

Read full topic

item.title: I Gotz 2 problmes! [Pic taking+cropping]
item.dc:creator: @RuNIg_jAvAA RuNIg jAvAA
item.description:
@RuNIg_jAvAA wrote:

Maskmanator:

First, take a picture using the “Prt Scr” key above the insert key on the right hand side of the keyboard. Then go into paint and then paste it using Ctrl+V. After that, use the dashed box tool in paint, drag it over the area that you wish to crop, copy the area, go to file > new, then paste it, and save it. A generic crop.

Thank you VERY much

Read full topic
